config.timestamp.column.name: PROCESS_DATE_CREATED
config.query: SELECT IMAGE_STYLEID AS STYLE_ID, PRICE_CHANGE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, NEW_RETAIL_PRICE, ACTIVITY_TYPE, PROCESS_DATE_CREATED, SITE_ID FROM MERCH.IRO_POS_PRICES INNER JOIN ELCAT.STYLE_COLOURS sc ON SUBSTR(sc.STYLEID,1,8) = STYLE_ID AND sc.COLOUR_ID = COLOR_ID AND SITE_ID in ('00990', '00011') AND BUSINESS_UNIT_ID = 1 AND PRICE_CHANGE_ID IS NOT NULL AND START_DATE IS NOT NULL
